name: css--bp-browser-ext
description: Browser Extension to show css breakpoints

scripts.build:static: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r icons/ dist/icons
scripts.watch: rm -rf dist .cache .parcel-cache && NODE_ENV=development npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:static && parcel watch --no-hmr src/{background.ts,content-script.ts} src/popup/{menu.ts,menu.html} src/popup/**/*.ts
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:tailwind && npm run build:static && parcel build src/{background.ts,content-script.ts}
